title: Assassination North Korean Kim Murdered in Airport…. Females With Needles! | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
According to South Korea’s TV Chosun, the half-brother of North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un was murdered Tuesday in Malaysia by two women who used poisoned needles to kill him before fleeing in a taxi cab.
Kim’s half brother named, Kim Jong Nam, was waiting for a flight at the time he was pricked with the needles.
Gary Franchi’s Next News Network brings on more on this report….
